name: Burger Shack
description:
You have rented a small shack in a clearing in the woods for your take-out burger restaurant.

The owner of the shack is very demanding though and they will keep increasing the rent and will kick you out if the popularity of your restaurant doesn't meet their demands.

Serve customers and use items to help you out. How long will you keep your burger shack open?

Read the guide in the game to know how to play it

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #36 - Our third year! 

The theme is "Uncontrollable Growth"
